*The devils sent by hermogenes obey james and fetter hermogenes ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73F2424 73F2424]) *Meeting of james and hermogenes ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73F2425 73F2425])

record.title: The martyrdom of St. Simon Zelotes and St. Jude Thaddaeus - they are beaten to death - miniature from folio 008rfrom the Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a

The martyrdom of St. Simon Zelotes and St. Jude Thaddaeus - they are beaten to death - miniature from [[:c:File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 008r.jpg|folio 008r]] from the [[:en:Book_of_Hours_of_Simon_de_Varie|Book of Hours of Simon de Varie]] - KB 74 G37a ===== Topics depicted in this miniature =====
*Martyrdom and death of judas thaddaeus: he is beaten to death and beheaded ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73F324 73F324]) *Martyrdom and death of simon zelotes: he is sawn in two, or beaten to death ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73F332 73F332])
[[File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 008r.jpg|thumb|left|This miniature is part of [[:c:File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 008r.jpg|folio 008r]]]]

record.title: The martyrdom of St. Stephen - he is stoned to death - miniature from folio 009rfrom the Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a

record.description:
The martyrdom of St. Stephen - he is stoned to death - miniature from [[:c:File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 009r.jpg|folio 009r]] from the [[:en:Book_of_Hours_of_Simon_de_Varie|Book of Hours of Simon de Varie]] - KB 74 G37a ===== Topics depicted in this miniature =====
*God the father as bearded old man, usually with crown or tiara or sceptre and/or globe ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11C23 11C23]) *The stoning of stephen; the witnesses lay down their clothes at saul's feet (+ god the father) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73F3563(+11) 73F3563(+11)])
[[File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 009r.jpg|thumb|left|This miniature is part of [[:c:File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 009r.jpg|folio 009r]]]]

record.title: St. Claudius, Bishop of Besancon, stills a storm at sea - miniature from folio 010vfrom the Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a
record.GWToolsettitle: St. Claudius, Bishop of Besancon, stills a storm at sea - Book of hours Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - _010v_min
record.description:
St. Claudius, Bishop of Besancon, stills a storm at sea - miniature from [[:c:File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 010v.jpg|folio 010v]] from the [[:en:Book_of_Hours_of_Simon_de_Varie|Book of Hours of Simon de Varie]] - KB 74 G37a ===== Topics depicted in this miniature =====
*Male saints (claudius) - post-mortem occurrences ~ male saint ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11H(CLAUDIUS)8 11H(CLAUDIUS)8]) *Devils in purely fantasy shape ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11K31 11K31]) *Insignia of bishop, e.g. mitre, crozier ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11P31131 11P31131]) *Storm at sea ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/26C32 26C32]) *Sailing-ship, sailing-boat (+ under way, at sea (~ travelling)) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/46C24(+63) 46C24(+63)]) *Saving a person from drowning ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/46C2931 46C2931]) *Damage (to a ship) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/46C298 46C298])
[[File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 010v.jpg|thumb|left|This miniature is part of [[:c:File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 010v.jpg|folio 010v]]]]

record.title: The martyrdom of St. Catherine of Alexandria - she is beheaded - miniature from folio 014rfrom the Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a
record.GWToolsettitle: The martyrdom of St. Catherine of Alexandria - she is beheaded - Book of hours Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - _014r_min
record.description:
The martyrdom of St. Catherine of Alexandria - she is beheaded - miniature from [[:c:File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 014r.jpg|folio 014r]] from the [[:en:Book_of_Hours_of_Simon_de_Varie|Book of Hours of Simon de Varie]] - KB 74 G37a ===== Topics depicted in this miniature =====
*The wheel of st. catherine of alexandria is destroyed by a thunderbolt from heaven, or by angels with a sword ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11HH(CATHERINE)631 11HH(CATHERINE)631]) *St. catherine of alexandria is beheaded ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11HH(CATHERINE)68 11HH(CATHERINE)68]) *Violent death by beheading ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/31E23621 31E23621])
[[File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 014r.jpg|thumb|left|This miniature is part of [[:c:File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 014r.jpg|folio 014r]]]]

record.title: St. Genevieve of Paris anointing the faithful - miniature from folio 015vfrom the Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a

record.description:

*Non-miraculous activities and events ~ st. genevieve ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11HH(GENEVIEVE)4 11HH(GENEVIEVE)4]) *The believer ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11Q11 11Q11]) *Blessing (either of things or persons), e.g. by anointing ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11Q7562 11Q7562])
[[File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 015v.jpg|thumb|left|This miniature is part of [[:c:File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 015v.jpg|folio 015v]]]]

record.title: St. Avia of Paris in prison receives a host from Mary - miniature from folio 018vfrom the Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a
record.GWToolsettitle: St. Avia of Paris in prison receives a host from Mary - Book of hours Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - _018v_min
record.description:
St. Avia of Paris in prison receives a host from Mary - miniature from [[:c:File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 018v.jpg|folio 018v]] from the [[:en:Book_of_Hours_of_Simon_de_Varie|Book of Hours of Simon de Varie]] - KB 74 G37a ===== Topics depicted in this miniature =====
*Appearances of mary ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11F82 11F82]) *Angel(s) with other object(s), e.g. weapons ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11G1926 11G1926]) *Female saints (avia of paris) - vision(avia of paris), mystic marriage of female saint ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11HH(AVIA OF PARIS)34 11HH(AVIA OF PARIS)34]) *Chalice bearing the host ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11Q73241 11Q73241]) *Prison, jail ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/44G311 44G311])
[[File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 018v.jpg|thumb|left|This miniature is part of [[:c:File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 018v.jpg|folio 018v]]]]

record.title: The martyrdom of St. Barbara - she is beheaded by her father Dioscuros - miniature from folio 019vfrom the Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a
record.GWToolsettitle: The martyrdom of St. Barbara - she is beheaded by her father Dioscuros - Book of hours Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - _019v_min
record.description:
The martyrdom of St. Barbara - she is beheaded by her father Dioscuros - miniature from [[:c:File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 019v.jpg|folio 019v]] from the [[:en:Book_of_Hours_of_Simon_de_Varie|Book of Hours of Simon de Varie]] - KB 74 G37a ===== Topics depicted in this miniature =====
*St. barbara is beheaded by her father dioscuros, who usually wears a turban and brandishes a scimitar (sword); sometimes dioscuros is struck by lightning ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11HH(BARBARA)68 11HH(BARBARA)68]) *Gripping someone by the hair ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/31A25441 31A25441]) *Violent death by beheading ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/31E23621 31E23621])
[[File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 019v.jpg|thumb|left|This miniature is part of [[:c:File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 019v.jpg|folio 019v]]]]

record.title: The arrest of Christ - the kiss of Judas; the ear of Malchus cut off by St. Peter - miniature from folio 020rfrom the Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a

*The kiss of judas: accompanied by soldiers with torches and lanterns, he kisses christ ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73D313 73D313]) *Malchus is healed by christ ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73D3142 73D3142])
[[File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 020r.jpg|thumb|left|This miniature is part of [[:c:File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 020r.jpg|folio 020r]]]]

record.title: Pentecost - the Holy Spirit descends upon Mary and the apostles - miniature from folio 029rfrom the Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a

record.description:

*Interior of the house ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/41A2 41A2]) *Codex - ll - codex open ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49LL72 49LL72]) *Reading ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49N 49N]) *Pentecost: the holy ghost descends upon (mary and) the apostles, sometimes paul and/or representatives of the nations present (acts 2:1-4) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73E5 73E5])
[[File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 029r.jpg|thumb|left|This miniature is part of [[:c:File:Book of Hours of Simon de Varie - KB 74 G37a - folio 029r.jpg|folio 029r]]]]
